uniport.RunÔÉÅ

uniport.Run(adatas=None, adata_cm=None, mode='h', lambda_s=0.5, labmda_recon=1.0, lambda_kl=0.5, lambda_ot=1.0, max_iteration=30000, ref_id=None, save_OT=False, out='latent', label_weight=None, reg=0.1, reg_m=1.0, batch_size=256, lr=0.0002, enc=None, gpu=0, Prior=None, loss_type='BCE', outdir='output/', input_id=0, pred_id=1, seed=124, batch_key='domain_id', source_name='source', rep_celltype='cell_type', umap=False, verbose=False, assess=False, show=False)[source]ÔÉÅ

Run data integration

Parameters

  • adatas ‚Äì List of AnnData matrices, e.g. [adata1, adata2].

  • adata_cm ‚Äì AnnData matrices containing common genes.

  • mode ‚Äì Choose from [‚Äòh‚Äô, ‚Äòv‚Äô, ‚Äòd‚Äô] If ‚Äòh‚Äô, integrate data with common genes (Horizontal integration) If ‚Äòv‚Äô, integrate data profiled from the same cells (Vertical integration) If ‚Äòd‚Äô, inetrgate data without common genes (Diagonal integration) Default: ‚Äòh‚Äô.

  • lambda_s ‚Äì Balanced parameter for common and specific genes. Default: 0.5

  • lambda_recon ‚Äì Balanced parameter for reconstruct term. Default: 1.0

  • lambda_kl ‚Äì Balanced parameter for KL divergence. Default: 0.5

  • lambda_ot ‚Äì Balanced parameter for OT. Default: 1.0

  • max_iteration ‚Äì Max iterations for training. Training one batch_size samples is one iteration. Default: 30000

  • ref_id ‚Äì Id of reference dataset. Default: None

  • save_OT ‚Äì If True, output a global OT plan. Need more memory. Default: False

  • out ‚Äì Output of uniPort. Choose from [‚Äòlatent‚Äô, ‚Äòproject‚Äô, ‚Äòpredict‚Äô]. If out==‚Äôlatent‚Äô, train the network and output cell embeddings. If out==‚Äôproject‚Äô, project data into the latent space and output cell embeddings. If out==‚Äôpredict‚Äô, project data into the latent space and output cell embeddings through a specified decoder. Default: ‚Äòlatent‚Äô.

  • label_weight ‚Äì Prior-guided weighted vectors. Default: None

  • reg ‚Äì Entropy regularization parameter in OT. Default: 0.1

  • reg_m ‚Äì Unbalanced OT parameter. Larger values means more balanced OT. Default: 1.0

  • batch_size ‚Äì Number of samples per batch to load. Default: 256

  • lr ‚Äì Learning rate. Default: 2e-4

  • enc ‚Äì structure of encoder

  • gpu ‚Äì Index of GPU to use if GPU is available. Default: 0

  • Prior ‚Äì Prior correspondence matrix. Default: None

  • loss_type ‚Äì type of loss. ‚ÄòBCE‚Äô, ‚ÄòMSE‚Äô or ‚ÄòL1‚Äô. Default: ‚ÄòBCE‚Äô

  • outdir ‚Äì Output directory. Default: ‚Äòoutput/‚Äô

  • input_id ‚Äì Only used when mode==‚Äôd‚Äô and out==‚Äôpredict‚Äô to choose a encoder to project data. Default: 0

  • pred_id ‚Äì Only used when out==‚Äôpredict‚Äô to choose a decoder to predict data. Default: 1

  • seed ‚Äì Random seed for torch and numpy. Default: 124

  • batch_key ‚Äì Name of batch in AnnData. Default: domain_id

  • source_name ‚Äì Name of source in AnnData. Default: source

  • rep_celltype ‚Äì Names of cell-type annotation in AnnData. Default: ‚Äòcell_type‚Äô

  • umap ‚Äì If True, perform UMAP for visualization. Default: False

  • verbose ‚Äì Verbosity, True or False. Default: False

  • assess ‚Äì If True, calculate the entropy_batch_mixing score and silhouette score to evaluate integration results. Default: False

  • show ‚Äì If True, show the UMAP visualization of latent space. Default: False

Returns

  • adata.h5ad ‚Äì The AnnData matrice after integration. The representation of the data is stored at adata.obsm[‚Äòlatent‚Äô], adata.obsm[‚Äòproject‚Äô] or adata.obsm[‚Äòpredict‚Äô].

  • checkpoint ‚Äì model.pt contains the variables of the model and config.pt contains the parameters of the model.

  • log.txt ‚Äì Records model parameters.

  • umap.pdf ‚Äì UMAP plot for visualization if umap=True.
